NPC.name: Myrai and Oshar
NPC.description: A pair of saurians, clearly young lovers judging by the affectionate touch, hand holding, snuggling,...and the faint scent permeating the room that indicates far more than that is often going on between them. The bustier of the pair is female, the more slender not judging by her bulge down below. Both have smiles on their tanned faces and seem quite happy together.

missText.text: the lovers attack fails to connect with TARGET

hitText.text: the lover hit TARGET for VALUE points of damage
